document.full_text: terrified passengers aboard a cathay pacific plane prayed together as their aircraft, one of its engines on fire, made its way back to singapore on monday, and their calm response earned praise from the captain.
document.title: calm and prayers help steer stricken plane back to singapore
lines_and_colors: terrified passengers aboard a cathay pacific plane prayed together as their aircraft, one of its engines on fire, made its way back to singapore on monday, and their calm response earned praise from the captain.
